content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Line (around x=8.5, y=13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine 1 at position (x=8.5, y=13.5)
- Iron gear input:
  - Wooden chest at (x=7.5, y=10.5) containing iron gears
  - Burner inserter at (x=8.5, y=10.5) feeding gears into assembler
- Output system:
  - Burner inserter at (x=10.5, y=13.5)
  - Wooden chest at (x=11.5, y=13.5) for collecting science packs
- Transport belt system connecting components (11 belts)

### Mining and Smelting Operations
Multiple mining/smelting setups:
1. First setup:
- Burner mining drill at (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Wooden chest at (x=41.5, y=-80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (x=41.5, y=-79.5)

2. Second setup:
- Burner mining drill at (x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
- Wooden chest at (x=-27.5, y=-59.5)
- Burner inserter at (x=-26.5, y=-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (x=-25.0, y=-59.0)
- Output inserter at (x=-23.5, y=-58.5)
- Output chest at (x=-22.5, y=-58.5) containing iron plates

3. Third setup:
- Burner mining drill at (x=-18.0, y=-53.0)
- Wooden chest at (x=-17.5, y=-51.5)
- Burner inserter at (x=-16.5, y=-51.5)
- Stone furnace at (x=-15.0, y=-51.0)
- Output inserter at (x=-13.5, y=-50.5)
- Output chest at (x=-12.5, y=-50.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System
- Steam engine at (x=-4.5, y=12.5)
- Boiler at (x=-4.5, y=16.0)
- Offshore pump at (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (fluid systems 3806, 3814)
- Electric pole network connecting power consumers

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Collision Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones
- Use appropriate spacing when placing entities next to each other
- Consider different directions or reference positions if default placement fails
- Pay attention to entity dimensions when placing larger machines

### Resource Management Errors
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to insert them
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner entities
- Monitor resource input/output flows in production lines

### Production Line Setup Errors
- Verify correct positioning of inserters relative to machines they serve
- Ensure proper connections between production line components
- Check that all required inputs are accessible to inserters

### Power System Issues
- Keep boilers fueled for consistent power generation
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine
- Maintain electrical connections through pole network to all consumers
